articles.title: Asian shares slip on Fed officials' hawkish policy stance - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares took a beating on Friday after a fresh salvo of hawkish remarks from Federal Reserve officials solidified expectations that U.S. interest rates could rise as soon as March, leaving markets braced for tighter monetary conditions.
